verses.1: Sanggamte aw, Pasianʼ thu hilhin note kiangah kong pai lai-in, mipilteʼ zat kam thuk pipi le pilna kamte ka zang kei hi.
verses.2: Bang hang hiam cih leh note kiangah ka om laitakin singlamteh tungah Jesu Khris a sihna thu sim loh thudang peuhmah ngaihsut loh dingin ka ngaihsut sa ahi hi.
verses.3: Tua ahih manin note kiangah kong pai lai-in thaneemin, launa tawh ka liing a,
verses.4: thu kong hilh ciangin zong leitung mipilteʼ zat kammalte le siamnate ka zang kei a, Pasianʼ Kha Siangtho vangliatna tawh thu kong hilh hi.
verses.5: Tua ahih manin noteʼ thu upna pen mihingteʼ pilna hang hi loin, Pasianʼ vangliatna hangin a um na hi uh hi.
verses.6: Ahi zongin kha thu lamah a khangham mite tungah pilna thu ka gen hi. Tua ka gen pilna pen tu-in a maimang kuankuan ta ding hih leitung miteʼ pilna le vangliatna thu hi lo hi.
verses.7: Tua ka gen pilna thu pen miteʼ theih lo dingin Pasian in a ipcip Pasianʼ pilna thusim hi a, eiteʼ minthan nadingin leitung pianmapekin Pasian in a na koih sa thu ahi hi.
verses.8: Hih leitung a uk mite kuamah in hih pilna thu thei lo uh hi. Thei hi le-uh, a minthang Topa pen singlamteh tungah na that lo ding uh hi.
verses.9: Tua ahih manin Lai Siangtho sungah, “Kuamah in a muh ngei loh, a zak ngei loh, piang thei dingin zong a ngaihsut loh uh thu pen Pasian in amah a it mite adingin a bawl kholh sak sa ahi hi,” ci-in na kigelh hi.
verses.10: Ahi zongin Pasian in a Kha Siangtho tawh eite tungah tua thusim a hong langsak hi. Tua Kha Siangtho in na khempeuh kan khia a, Pasianʼ ngimna a ki-imcip a thu tawng dong takin a kan khia hi.
verses.11: Mihing khatʼ ngaihsutna pen ama lungsim bek mah in a theih mah bangin Pasianʼ Kha Siangtho bek mah in Pasianʼ thu a cingin a thei hi.
verses.12: Eiteʼ ngah lungsim pen leitung miteʼ lungsim hi lo a, Pasian in eite tungah a hong piak na khempeuh i theih nadingin Pasianʼ hong piak Kha Siangtho lungsim ahi hi.
verses.13: Tua ahih manin hih bangin thu kong gen uh ciangin zong, mihingteʼ hong hilh pilna kamte a zang hi loin, Kha Siangtho a nei mite tungah kha tawh kisai thu ka gen uh ciangin Kha Siangtho in a hong hilh kammalte zangin a gen ka hi uh hi.
verses.14: Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho a nei lo mite in Pasianʼ Kha Siangtho in a hong piak nate sang thei lo uh hi. Kha Siangtho a nei mite bek in theithei uh ahih manin amaute in tel thei lo uh a, amau adingin a haihuai thu khat ahi lel hi.
verses.15: Kha Siangtho a nei mite in na khempeuh theithei uh a, ahi zongin leitung mite in bangmah thei lo uh ahih manin a lungmang uh hi.
verses.16: Tua ahih manin Lai Siangtho in, “Kua in Topaʼ lungsim thei a, ama gamtat nading lam lak thei ahi hiam?” na ci hi. Ahi zongin eite in Khris lungsim i nei hi.
